ticket.title: ToolchainFingerprintV1: stable derivation, caching, and inclusion in receipts/attestation

tickets.reason: Lane target namespaces require toolchain fingerprint.

in_scope: Define toolchain fingerprint derivation (e.g., rustc -Vv + cargo -V + nextest -V + systemd-run -V as needed).
Cache fingerprint per boot/session under `$APM2_HOME/private/fac/toolchain/` with safe perms.
Ensure all job receipts include toolchain_fingerprint and lane target dir uses it.

steps: Wire into lane profile and target path computation.

criteria: Fingerprint changes when underlying toolchain changes.
Fingerprint is consistent across processes on the same node.
